main event: A bright round object was observed in Uruguay on June 15, 1957, moving at a steady speed before it disappeared below the horizon.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light with a solid appearance and metallic characteristics.,Witnesses reported a loud high-frequency sound, similar to the humming of a bee.,The object's course was towards the north.,The observation lasted for approximately 102 seconds.,Conclusions drawn indicated that it could possibly have been a balloon.
